title: Drawing, "Mountain Landscape", possibly 1856
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on green paper.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of Hennequin Point and the American falls at Niagara.

Verso: Probably an imaginary landscape showing  a valley stretching backwards with a town situated upon a plateau in the distance, drawn in the opposite direction from the verso.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mountain Landscape", possibly 1856.
possibly 1856. Graphite, brush and white gouache on green paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-146-b.
